data.title: Company Information
data.meta_description: This page is to introduce the History of TIS.
data.text:
History

History of TIS Inc.

April, 1971 Toyo Information Systems Co., Ltd. was incorporated in Higashi-ku, Osaka (presently, Chuo-ku), and began software development services. August, 1973 Head office building was completed in Suita, Osaka, and full-scale data center services and online services started. November, 1987 Listed on Second Section of the Osaka Securities Exchange. July, 1988 Toyo Information Systems (USA) Co., Ltd. (todayâs TIS Ventures, Inc.) was established in California, United States. February, 1990 Listed on Second Section of the Tokyo Stock Exchange. September, 1991 Changed to First Section of the Tokyo Stock Exchange and First Section of the Osaka Securities Exchange. April, 2000 Made Komatsu Soft Ltd. (todayâs QUALICA Inc.) into its subsidiary. January, 2001 Changed corporate name to TIS Inc. February, 2002 Made AGREX INC. into its subsidiary. June, 2003 TISI (Shanghai) Co., Ltd., was established. April, 2004 Made UFIT Co., Ltd. into its subsidiary. April, 2005 Made Asahi Kasei Information Systems Co., Ltd. (todayâs AJS Inc.) into its subsidiary. August, 2007 Opened The Representative Office of TIS Inc. in Beijin. April, 2008 IT Holdings Corporation (ITHD is the acronym for IT Holdings) established as a joint holding company by TIS Inc. and INTEC Holdings, Ltd.

TIS December, 2009 Opened The Representative Office of TIS Inc. in Ho Chi Minh City. April, 2011 TIS Inc., SORUN CORPORATION and UFIT Co., Ltd., merged with TIS, the surviving company. January, 2012 TISI (Singapore) Pte. Ltd. was established. October, 2013 Opened The Representative Office of TIS Inc. in Jakarta. June, 2014 Made I AM Consulting Co., Ltd., a SAP total solution provider in Thailand, into its subsidiary. November, 2014 TISI (Thailand) Co., Ltd. was established. May, 2016 Made PromptNow Co., Ltd., a developer of mobile applications for financial institutions in Thailand, into its subsidiary.

TIS INTEC Group April, 2009 IT Service Force Inc. established as subsidiary to provide shared back-office services for Group companies. July, 2009 Systems Engineering Laboratory Co., Ltd., and TIS Solution Business Co., Ltd., underwent management integrated to form NEOAXIS Co., Ltd. December, 2009 Made SORUN CORPORATION into ITHD's subsidiary. January, 2012 Centralized offices of Group companies in Tokyo area. November, 2013 Made Chuo System Corporation into ITHD's wholly owned subsidiary. June, 2014 ITHD debuted a single logo for all Group companies. July, 2015 Centralized offices of Group companies in Osaka area. April, 2016 Partial transfer of businesses between TIS and INTEC Inc. July, 2016 Centralize offices of Group companies in Nagoya area.
